# PhysicalMaterial — Property Reference
# Use with set_material_property / set_material_properties
# Map slots use _map suffix. Toggle maps with _map_on (boolean).

## Base
base_weight : float                     # overall base weight
base_color : color                      # (color R G B)
base_color_map : texturemap             # texture slot
reflectivity : float                    # reflection amount 0.0-1.0
roughness : float                       # 0.0 = mirror
roughness_inv : boolean                 # true = glossiness mode
metalness : float                       # 0.0-1.0
diff_roughness : float                  # diffuse roughness (Oren-Nayar)
refl_color : color                      # reflection tint

## Anisotropy
anisotropy : float
anisoangle : float                      # anisotropy rotation
aniso_mode : integer                    # 0=default
aniso_channel : integer

## Transparency (glass/liquid)
transparency : float                    # 0.0 = opaque, 1.0 = glass
trans_color : color
trans_depth : float
trans_roughness : float
trans_roughness_lock : boolean          # lock to base roughness
trans_ior : float                       # index of refraction
thin_walled : boolean
dispersion : float                      # chromatic dispersion

## Subsurface
scattering : float                      # SSS weight 0.0-1.0
sss_color : color
sss_depth : float
sss_scale : float
sss_scatter_color : color

## Emission
emission : float                        # emission weight 0.0-1.0
emit_color : color
emit_luminance : float                  # cd/m²
emit_kelvin : float                     # color temperature

## Coating
coating : float                         # coat weight 0.0-1.0
coat_color : color
coat_roughness : float
coat_roughness_inv : boolean
coat_ior : float
coat_affect_color : float
coat_affect_roughness : float
coat_anisotropy : float
coat_anisoangle : float

## Sheen
sheen : float                           # sheen weight 0.0-1.0
sheen_color : color
sheen_roughness : float

## Thin Film
thin_film : float                       # weight 0.0-1.0
thin_film_thickness : float             # nm, ~300-700 for iridescence
thin_film_ior : float

## Maps (texturemap slots)
base_weight_map, base_color_map, reflectivity_map, refl_color_map,
roughness_map, metalness_map, diff_rough_map, anisotropy_map,
aniso_angle_map, transparency_map, trans_color_map, trans_rough_map,
trans_ior_map, scattering_map, sss_color_map, sss_scale_map,
emission_map, emit_color_map, coat_map, coat_color_map,
coat_rough_map, coat_aniso_map, coat_aniso_angle_map,
sheen_map, sheen_color_map, sheen_rough_map,
thin_film_map, thin_film_ior_map,
bump_map, coat_bump_map, displacement_map, cutout_map

## Bump Amounts
bump_map_amt : float                    # bump strength
clearcoat_bump_map_amt : float          # coat bump strength
displacement_map_amt : float            # displacement strength
